title: Major (Hindi)
short_cast: Adivi Sesh, Prakash Raj, Sobhita Dhulipala, Saiee Manjrekar, Revathi, Murli Sharma
cast: Adivi Sesh, Prakash Raj, Sobhita Dhulipala, Saiee Manjrekar, Revathi, Murli Sharma
genre: Military Movies, Movies Based on Real Life, Hindi-Language Movies, Action & Adventure, Dramas

desc: This biopic follows the life of Indian Army officer Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan, from his childhood to his heroic actions during the 2008 Mumbai attacks.
